name: Establishes Emergence Theorems
description: Establishes fundamental mathematical theorems governing the emergence, properties, and universal characteristics of temporal order in complex systems.
subject: urn:uor:resource:emergent-temporal-order
contextualDescription: The Emergent Temporal Order resource establishes four key theorems: the Temporal Order Emergence Theorem defining conditions for when synchronization occurs based on coupling strength thresholds, the Temporal Hierarchy Formation Theorem explaining how patterns organize into multi-scale structures, the Temporal Universality Theorem identifying scale-free properties near critical points, and the Temporal Resilience Theorem quantifying how emergent order creates stability against perturbations.
